review: Can't believe that this was all I needed in order to receive Amazon Prime movies, etc. I'm catching up on lost time.
author: carlster21 "Carl Gonzalez"

review: Yeah!  Love it.  I'm now able to access a ton of programs without commercials and canned laughter, etc.and I haven't explored everything yet.  There's plenty more to look through.  I wanted to watch on my TV, not the computer, and now I can.  It's very easy to install.  My only problem was I mixed up  my password.  Other than my own error, very simple.  Worth the money!
author: Gail

review: It works. But not very sexy or streamlined for my taste. I have an Apple TV and just wanted to get prime streaming so I bought this. But besides the Amazon streaming on the stick, the Apple TV is so much better designed and user friendly along with having AirPlay which is a huge plus for iOS users.
author: Doni

review: Absolutely amazing!  I can't say enough great things about this device. I love it!
author: Joshua Eastridge

review: Perfect for our HDTV that resides in our bedroom. Exceptional options and quality.
author: Amazon Customer "Kewl Studios"
